> why thier is only one commit in snap ui project probably u copied from somewhere otherwise creating such thing will take atleast 50-60 commits minimum if u are a decent developer

Hey @anurag6569201,

I appreciate your curiosity but let me clarify a few things first. Earlier it was named Tinker AI (https://github.com/coderxtushar/Tinker-AI), but due to some merge conflicts and errors in the codebase, which resulted in the loss of some of my local repo code as well, I had to take this step.

Like these --->
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3ac23575-d2b8-4061-a965-33f29770e0c0)

Hope i might be able to convince you, and if not then here is my Discord Id(https://discordapp.com/users/1014353403738079242) I’d be happy to walk you through the architecture sometime.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3801
activity.text:
Hi @viraj89,

I'd love to take this up! Having built Snap UI (https://snap-ui-lovat.vercel.app/) —a no-code, AI-powered UI generator that turns natural language into structured React components—I’m confident in handling prompt interpretation, schema structuring, and real-time UI feedback.

This Beckn Catalog Builder aligns perfectly with my experience in AI-driven interface generation, and I’d love to bring that expertise to this repo. Would be great if you could assign me this one .

Thanks, 
Tushar Gautam
